content: row 3 mds k to 2 sts before m k2tog sl m p1 k1 p1 twice turn 1 st decrease row 4 p1 k1 p1 twice sl m p4 turn row 5 repeat row 3 row 6 p1 k1 p1 twice sl m p to end p the double st as they appear place the 15 shoulder sts onto scrap yarn cut working yarn leaving 20 in 50 cm tail to graft shoulder pieces later right front v-neck shaping attach needles onto cable if using interchangeable needles or replace sts to needles from scrap yarn with rs facing join yarn at where the v-neck begins row 1 rs p1 k1 p1 twice sl m ssk k to end 1 st decrease row 2 p to m sl m p1 k1 p1 twice turn repeat above two rounds until 18 sts rem ending on row 1 shoulder shaping row 1 ws p to m sl m p1 k1 p1 twice turn row 2 p1 k1 p1 twice sl m ssk k7 turn 1 st decrease ©2022 julie peng p 5 row 3 mds p to m sl m p1 k1 p1 twice turn row 4 p1 k1 p1 twice sl m ssk k3 turn row 5 repeat row 3 row 6 p1 k1 p1 twice sl m ssk k to end k the double st as they appear place the 15 shoulder sts onto scrap yarn cut working yarn leaving 20 in 50 cm tail to graft shoulder pieces later back armhole shaping work as for front attach needles onto cable if using interchangeable needles or replace sts to needles from scrap yarn with rs facing join yarn at right underarm body work in st st until piece measures the same as the beginning of shoulder shaping for the front ending on ws setup row rs k10 pm k56 pm k10 turn shoulder shapings row 1 ws p to m sl m *p1 k1 repeat from * to next m sl m p6 turn row 2 mds k to m sl m *k1 p1 repeat from * to next m sl m k6 turn row 3 mds p to m sl m *p1 k1 repeat from * to next m sl m p3 turn row 4 mds k to m sl m *k1 p1 repeat from * to next m sl m k3 turn row 5 mds p to m sl m *p1 k1 repeat from * to next m sl m p to end p the double st as they appear turn row 6 k to m sl m *k1 p1 repeat from * to next m sl m k to end k the double st as they appear turn row 7 p to m sl m p1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to 5 sts before m turn row 8 bobble all sts in pattern to 4 sts before next m cut yarn leaving sufficient length to weave in tail connect shoulders graft the 15 front and back shoulders
